law.text: Except as otherwise provided in 1974 Acts ch. 74, all rules, regulations, acts, agreements, determinations and decisions of the Department of Public Safety, Department of Highways, Department of Motor Transportation, Department of Aeronautics, and Department of Revenue, shall remain in effect within the cabinet until duly modified or repealed by the secretary.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 14.
